programme.title: Deception
programme.desc: Sindia, who constantly thwarts her parents matchmaking efforts, finally meets a man she wants to marry, Demola, but has to fight to win her father's approval.

programme.title: Fashion Insider S1 - Frances Theodore
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Shades Of Lies
programme.desc: Teni's ambitions get the best of her when she follows bad advices at work after her boss, chief maxwell, is involved in an accident. When chief maxwell's family suspect foul play, the police get involved and it becomes increasingly clear that there is more to chief maxwell's death than meets the eye.

programme.title: Burning Desire
programme.desc: After getting drunk during a club party with friends, kay gets entangled in a one-night stand with an older married woman, mariah, who becomes obsessed with him. Things go awry when kay comes back home from work one evening and finds mariah sitting in his living room with his wife, angela, claiming to be his aunt who just returned from overseas.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep2
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 7
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Burning Pain
programme.desc: After his wife becomes sick and unable to move properly, Michael takes on the extra responsibility of caring for her. Is he doing this out of the goodness of his heart or is there something nefarious going on behind close doors?

programme.title: Fashion Insider S1 - Simisanyaa
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Green
programme.desc: After years of being alone, believing they have missed out on love, two people, who are old in years but young at heart, find each other.

programme.title: My Bosses
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Esther is stuck in a complicated love triangle between two men, Josh, a past love, and Ade, his fun, mischievous friend, both of whom happen to be her new bosses.

programme.title: We Tha Boyz
programme.desc: Four jolly teenagers decide to help their friend, Tokunbo in his plans to get the love of Chioma, however a rival gang is also vying for her atention. Tokunboâ€™s parents go out of town and they decide to throw the ultimate house party to impress her. As simple as the plan seems, in reality however, they get in several problems in order to pull it off and end up almost ruining the house.

programme.title: The Missing Package
programme.desc: In The Missing Package, Detective Lazarus is almost done for the day when an unassuming middle-aged man walks in and reports a package he is expecting missing, but more importantly is the carrier who seems to have disappeared into thin air. This sets Detective Lazarus on a wild goose chase to find what appears to be a package determined not to be found and a carrier who appears to no longer exist.

programme.title: Blood & Rope
programme.desc: When 21-year-old Nnadubem becomes fascinated by the dambe traditional Hausa sport of bare- knuckle rope boxing. He has to convert a community of doubters and earn the respect of fellow fighters to be accepted as a warrior.

programme.title: Violet
programme.desc: Temi is on the verge of tying the knot with his long time girlfriend Renny, but inexplicably changes his mind when he meets a blind lady named Violet.

programme.title: Quick Assignment
programme.desc: Remmy, an illegal immigrant trying to make ends meet in America, ignores the advances of a responsible businessman for a good-looking fraudster who leads her down the wrong path.

programme.title: Becoming Mrs Eze
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When Tatiana accepts Eze's marriage proposal, her friends and family believe she has chosen wrong due to the fact that he is considered unrefined and broke, and Eze's family believe that Tatiana is a city girl that is not good enough for him. Will Tatiana and Eze's love be strong enough to withstand all the judgement?

programme.title: Faults and Blames
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When the baby of a young couple goes missing, long-buried resentment and bitterness rears its ugly head, causing damage that can never be rectified.

programme.title: AMC Music Moments - Playlist 454
programme.desc: AMC presents music from the latest African artists

programme.title: Freda
programme.desc: Tobi is completely in love with his fiercely very rich and successful girlfriend, Freda. He does everything to make her happy but she doesn't seem satisfied with anything he does. When she says yes after his public marriage proposal, he believes everything in their life is perfect, but things start to spiral out of control.
